Text.Page:
It seems the {@LinkCreature:22#9#shadow instructors} are going to destroy the world. And they didn't invite me.

I want you to stop them. It's all well and good to plot, but exclude me and it stops being fun!

A witch rarely gives her word because we're loathe to break them. You've done a great service and I won't forget it.

I hope this madness ends soon. Do you know what I miss? Leeches...and peaches.
